author: LISA MASCARO
title: Oil, sanctions, jets: How Congress pushes Biden on Ukraine
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — At first, the White House resisted calls from Congress to ban Russian oil imports to the U.S.
content: WASHINGTON (AP) — At first, the White House resisted calls from Congress to ban Russian oil imports to the U.S. And then, it did just that. The administration hit the brakes on legislation that would… [+5490 chars]
